body:
`spack install swig` appears to download `html` page instead of the source with system's curl `7.35.0`.

Supposedly, it's the difference between the http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/swig/swig-3.0.8.tar.gz
and the direct link http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/swig/swig/swig-3.0.10/swig-3.0.10.tar.gz
title: swig fails to download on Ubuntu 14.04 (sourceforge issue?)
